description: Celebrate the end of summer with this refreshing mocktail. Tart lemons meet sweet strawberries and cooling mint to creating a sparkly delicious drink!
name: Lemon Berry Mint Sparkler
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fresh strawberries (plus 4 extra for garnish)
2 tablespoons fresh mint (plus more leaves for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a juicer, juice 2-4 lemons until you get 1/2 cup. How many really depends on how juicy they are, I used 2 but I have pretty juicy lemons from my tree.
Place the fresh pressed lemon juice, 1 cup strawberries, 2 tablespoons mint and maple syrup into a blender. Blend until pulverized into a thick puree.
Place puree into a pitcher, and add sparkling water and ice. Slice 4 extra strawberries and add to the pitcher. Pour into glasses/mason jars, garnish with mint and serve.
